content: I found the ntfs-3g process was using 100% cpu. Apparently VMWARE can thrash the hard drive so the workaround is to set mainMem.useNamedFile=FALSE in the virtual machines .vmx file and VMware will perform faster.
title: Ubuntu: VMWare Runs Slow on NTFS Partition
name: ubuntu-vmware-runs-slow-on-ntfs-partition
